column1: Éothain is a character invented for The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers. He was played by Sam Comery. He is named after a Éothain.

Éothain and his younger sister Freda were sent by their mother Morwen (film character) to alert Théoden that the Dunlendings were pillaging through Rohan. Éothain and Freda were kept safe at Edoras until Théoden led his people to Helms Deep
column2: where they were reunited with their mother.
